results.title: Additional reduction in blood pressure after cholesterol-lowering treatment by statins (lovastatin or pravastatin) in hypercholesterolemic patients using angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitors (enalapril or lisinopril).
results.text_hl: Additional reduction @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@in blood pressure@@@ after @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@-lowering treatment by statins (@CHEMICAL_Lovastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008148 @@@lovastatin@@@ or @CHEMICAL_Pravastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017035 @@@pravastatin@@@) in @<m>DISEASE_Hyperlipoproteinemia_Type_II</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006938 @@@hypercholesterolemic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ using angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitors (@CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@enalapril@@@ or @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@).
